Attention All Singapore Vehicle Owners:We understand the challenges many of you are facing with delays in obtaining your Vehicle Entry Permit (VEP) for entering Malaysia. To help streamline the process  we are excited to announce an Express VEP Registration Service.By paying an additional fee of 100 MYR  you can enjoy the following benefits:Priority VEP Approval: Get your VEP registered in the system faster.Next-Day RFID Tag Collection: Once approved  collect your RFID tag at a designated location in Johor the following day.This express service ensures that your registration is processed quickly  allowing you to enter Malaysia without the usual wait times.If you're interested or need more details  please dm me to get started.Travel smoothly and avoid the hassle with our expedited service!
